in1: You can easily find out holiday information and market prices through us.We will immediately inform you about the crop prices in the market today.
in2:
Here is information about seeds, fertilizers, and pesticides.
 Click on each to see the details.
in3: Here we will provide details of schemes coming from the state and central government.
steps:
This feature allows you to give instructions through your voice.   
 1.  Press the Start Listening button. 
 2. Say information through your voice.  
 3.  Press the Stop Listening button to end the voice recording. 
 4. Previous information can be deleted via the Reset button.
